title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - kro: Simplifying Kubernetes Resource Orchestration (OPN308)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - kro：简化 Kubernetes 资源编排 (OPN308)
abstract: Discover kro, the open source tool revolutionizing Kubernetes resource management through configuration-based orchestration. Learn how this vendor-neutral solution eliminates custom coding needs through Simple Schema and CEL expressions, making complex resource dependencies manageable for teams of all sizes. We'll demonstrate how kro transforms Kubernetes into a centralized platform that accelerates developer velocity, improves fleet management and streamlines infrastructure deployment while maintaining organizational best practices and governance.
abstract_cn: 探索 kro，这个开源工具通过基于配置的编排彻底改变了 Kubernetes 资源管理。了解这个供应商中立的解决方案如何通过 Simple Schema 和 CEL 表达式消除自定义编码需求，使各种规模的团队都能轻松管理复杂的资源依赖关系。我们将演示 kro 如何将 Kubernetes 转变为一个集中式平台，加速开发者效率，改进集群管理并简化基础设施部署，同时保持组织最佳实践和治理。
